name: EverEternal WinterWorld
description:
EverEternal WinterWorld is the story of a young man, tasked with saving the world from a diabolical villain intent on invoking an eternal winter (hence the name). Run, jump and shoot your way through a bunch of levels and nonsense to stop him.

How to Play

(By Default)

A - Jump

S - Shoot

D - Run (Needed!)

W - Menu / Weapon Switcher

Down - Action

Arrows - Move and Aim

This can all be changed using Config.exe

The new and load game menu's are controlled via the arrow keys and action to select a slot.

Info

This Game is Freeware only and was made for The Daily Click's (www.create-games.com) Xmas Competition 2007.

For optimal playing experience you will need a keyboard that supports up to 5 key presses at once ( e.g. Jump + Run + Shoot + Right + Down ) or a joystick.
